2. Departments

Departments
===========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Administration](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/153/Administration)

   The Administration Department is made up of the City Manager, City Secretary, Assistant to the City Manager, City Attorney, Finance Officer and the Human Resources Coordinator.
2. #### [Code Enforcement](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/259/Code-Enforcement)
3. #### [Community Development](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/150/Community-Development)

   The Community Development Department is located in the Livingston Municipal Complex located at 200 West Church Street.
4. #### [Electric](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/160/Electric)
5. #### [Finance](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/157/Finance)

   The City Manager and Finance Officer are responsible for the financial records of the City including recording and reporting financial transactions, maintaining permanent accounting records, preparation of the annual financial report.
6. #### [Fire](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/161/Fire)

   The Livingston Volunteer Fire Department provides Livingston and the surrounding area with fire prevention, fire protection, medical first responders, rescue operations and hazardous material responses.
7. #### [Garage](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/162/Garage)
8. #### [Human Resources](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/163/Human-Resources)

   Find an employment application and a link to job openings in the City of Livingston.
9. #### [Livingston Municipal Library](http://www.livingstonlibrary.net/)

   Visit the Livingston Municipal Library website for current activities and information.
10. #### [Main Street](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/165/Main-Street)

    Livingston Main Street was established in 2005.
11. #### [Municipal Airport](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/166/Municipal-Airport)

    Livingston Municipal Airport, an uncontrolled general aviation utility airport, is located on the eastern side of Lake Livingston in the west central part of Polk County, approximately 6 miles southwest of downtown Livingston on FM 350 South, at an elevation of 151 feet above sea level.
12. #### [Municipal Court](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/167/Municipal-Court)

    The Livingston Municipal Court is responsible for Class C misdemeanors, Animal Control Violations, Code Enforcement Violations and other state and city ordinance violations punishable by fines only.
13. #### [Parks & Recreation](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/168/Parks-Recreation)

    Learn about the events held by the Parks and Recreation department.
14. #### [Police](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/172/Police)

    The Livingston Police Department is located at 208 West Church Street.
15. #### [Public Works](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/258/Public-Works)
16. #### [Sanitation](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/173/Sanitation)

    The city has contracted with Waste Services to provide twice weekly curbside collection of residential garbage and trash. Learn about trash pickup and what fees apply.
17. #### [Trade Days](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/175/Trade-Days)

    Trade Days is held monthly in Pedigo Park, which is conveniently located just 2/10 mile off the 59 corridor, in the center of Livingston, Texas, one hour north of Houston Intercontinental Airport and one hour south of Lufkin.
18. #### [Utilities](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/154/Utilities)

    The City of Livingston provides and bills for electricity, water, sewer and garbage service. Find out how to apply for service and find rates.

* [Building Code
